directions: In a large bowl, combine the chicken, raisins, mustard, mayonnaise, pineapple, curry powder and celery. Mix ingredients and divide among four servings of lettuce.
Top with pecans and  garnish with grapes.
ingredients: 4 cups boneless whole chicken breasts, cooked and chopped
1 head iceberg lettuce - rinsed, dried, and chopped
title: Sleepy Hollow Chicken Salad Supreme
